query.Description: Whether to include full localization dictionaries (name_localizations and description_localizations) in the returned objects, instead of the name_localized and description_localized fields. Default false.

json.Description: Name of command, 1-32 characters

json.Type: dictionary with keys in available locales
json.Description: Localization dictionary for the name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name
1-100 character description

json.Type: dictionary with keys in available locales
json.Description: Localization dictionary for the description field. Values follow the same restrictions as description
the parameters for the command
Set of permissions represented as a bit set
Indicates whether the command is available in DMs with the app, only for globally-scoped commands. By default, commands are visible.
Replaced by default_member_permissions and will be deprecated in the future. Indicates whether the command is enabled by default when the app is added to a guild.
Type of command, defaults 1 if not set
